name: Bloody Cross [2]
description: Just like the scary bloody red, the cross-shaped mace with the force of Shadow frightens people to hell.

name: Bloody Dead Branch
description: Has seen countless tragic years, and through its magical branches and a blood contract can summon more powerful monsters. They may be summoned for up to 10 minutes. (Can only be used in guild territory.)

name: Bloody Dead Branch 1.0
description: Being through countless wretched years, the magical branch can contract with blood to summon stronger monsters. Those monsters can survive for at most 30 minutes. (used only in guild territory)

name: Bloody Dead Branch 2.0
description: Being through countless wretched years, the magical branch can contract with blood to summon stronger monsters. Those monsters can survive for at most 30 minutes. (used only in guild territory)

name: Bloody Dead Branch 3.0
description: Being through countless wretched years, the magical branch can contract with blood to summon stronger monsters. Those monsters can survive for at most 30 minutes. (used only in guild territory)

name: Bloody Roar [2]
description: If touched with blood, the weapon will cry itself. So it is called the Bloody Roar, and is powerful for human-type enemies.

name: Bloody Roar [3]
description: If touched with blood, the weapon will cry itself. So it is called the Bloody Roar, and is powerful for human-type enemies.

name: Bloody Rune
description: This can be associated with the red color of blood. There is a wheel engraved inside. Being a very rare item, it can be used to make high-end headwear.

name: Blossom
description: The legendary headdress of Kabuki in the far-east Divine Country, long before the age of Sakura City and Tianjin Hall. The headwear has a history of a thousand years, from which you can still can feel the beauty's charm.

name: Blossom[1]
description: The legendary headdress of Kabuki in the far-east Divine Country, long before the age of Sakura City and Tianjin Hall. The headwear has a history of a thousand years, from which you can still can feel the beauty's charm.

name: Blow Gun
description: A secret weapon. If you want to use it without others noticing, You need a lot of exercise and skills.

name: Blow Gun Blueprint
description: A secret weapon. If you want to use it without others noticing, You need a lot of exercise and skills.

name: Blue Charm·Chic
description: A popular Coloring Agent in Lunatic fashion world. It's loved by every Lunatic. Use to unlock the Eclipse appearance for Lunatic.

name: Blue Clothing Dye
description: It can dye clothing materials blue.

name: Blue Crystal
description: Blue chips left in an unknown mine by a group of dwarves.

name: Blue Enchantress Blueprint
description: This flower has a short live, but the it's will to live is to make the miracle come true.

name: Blue Gemstone
description: Ore with magical Str. It can offset the reaction of magic in place of the caster when casting a spell.

name: Blue Hairband
description: Close your eyes to hear sounds from the sea and mountain as you put the hairband on. But who is calling？
